required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Lanabecestat (LY3314814) in Early Alzheimer's Disease Dementia
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Delayed-Start Study of LY3314814 (AZD3293) in Early Alzheimer's Disease Dementia (Extension of Study AZES, The AMARANTH Study)

brief_summary.textblock: This study is an extension of study I8D-MC-AZES (NCT02245737), the AMARANTH study. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of the study drug lanabecestat in participants with early Alzheimer's disease dementia at the time of entry into study I8D-MC-AZES.

primary_outcome.measure: Delayed Start Analysis on the 13-item Alzheimer's Disease Assessment Scale - Cognitive Subscale (ADAS-Cog13)
primary_outcome.description: Delayed start analysis on the ADAS-Cog13

secondary_outcome.measure: Delayed Start Analysis on the Alzheimer´s Disease Cooperative Study Activities of Daily Living Inventory (ADCS-iADL) Instrumental Items
secondary_outcome.description: Delayed start analysis on the ADCS-iADL instrumental items

secondary_outcome.measure: Delayed Start Analysis on the Functional Activities Questionnaire (FAQ) Score
secondary_outcome.description: Delayed start analysis on the FAQ score

secondary_outcome.measure: Delayed Start Analysis on the Integrated Alzheimer's Disease Rating Scale (iADRS) Score
secondary_outcome.description: Delayed start analysis on the iADRS score

secondary_outcome.measure: Delayed Start Analysis on the Mini-Mental Status Examination (MMSE)
secondary_outcome.description: Delayed start analysis on the MMSE

secondary_outcome.measure: Delayed Start Analysis on the ADAS-Cog13
secondary_outcome.description: Delayed start analysis on the ADAS-Cog13

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants previously enrolled in AMARANTH (NCT02245737) who meet eligibility criteria for delayed start I8D-MC-AZFD.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants who participate in AMARANTH (NCT02245737) who develop new conditions precluding them from enrolling into I8D-MC-AZFD.

link.description: Click here for more information about this study: A Study of LY3314814 in Early Alzheimer's Disease Dementia

patient_data.ipd_description: Lilly provides access to the individual patient data from studies on approved medicines and indications as defined by the sponsor specific information on ClinicalStudyDataRequest.com. This access is provided in a timely fashion after the primary publication is accepted. Researchers need to have an approved research proposal submitted through ClinicalStudyDataRequest.com. Access to the data will be provided in a secure data sharing environment after signing a data sharing agreement.
